question: Which country is to play host to the next Women’s T20 World Cup in February 2023?
explanation:
The International Cricket Council (ICC) recently announced that the next Women’s T20 World Cup would be held in February 2023 in South Africa.
Earlier, it was announced that the Women’s T20 World Cup was earlier scheduled to be held in November 2022. Earlier, ICC had postponed the Women’s World Cup planned in New Zealand from 2021 to 2022.
